Calanthe triplicata (Willemet) Ames, Philipp. J. Sci ., C
2: 326, 1907

Distribution:— Tropical and subtropical Asia, Sri Lanka , India and eastwards into the Pacific.

Distribution:— Southern Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and Malesia as far east as New Guinea .

Note:— A plant identified as
C. rubens Ridl.
by Nyan Tun (2014: 89) is a colour form of
C. vestita .
